short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Earn and share commissions from retailers on your online purchases with someone you care about.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Support Friends, Family, and Community—Effortlessly.
With Tufa, your everyday shopping earns free funds for people and causes you care about. Just shop, and we’ll do the rest.

Get Ready to Make a Difference!

The Tufa browser extension makes it easy to earn commission from 12,000+ brands, with no extra cost to you. Your shopping automatically supports friends, teachers, caregivers, sports teams, and more.

By installing the extension, you agree to Tufa’s Terms & Conditions:
https://www.jointufa.com/termsofservice

🛍 Shop at Thousands of Stores
Earn free funds from brands you love, including Best Buy, Walmart, Home Depot, and more, to help the ones who need it.

✅ Earn with One Click
Visit a supported store, and we’ll alert you to activate your commission. Just one click, then shop as usual.

🙌 Support That Stacks Up
Invite others to join your Circle, turning their purchases into free funds for your shared cause.

💯 Shopping That Gives Back
If the store doesn’t support Tufa, we’ll let you know where you can still make an impact.

📈 Track the Impact
Easily see the funds you and your Circle have earned, and how much you’re helping—right from the Tufa dashboard.

With Tufa, brands pay us commission on your purchases, and we pass that support on to people and groups you care about.
